if (WITH_METIS MATCHES "auto")
  set(METIS_PATH "metis/metis-5.1.0" CACHE INTERNAL "Path of Metis")
  set(GKLIB_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${METIS_PATH}/GKlib" CACHE INTERNAL "Path of GKlib")
  add_subdirectory(${METIS_PATH})
  set(METIS_INCLUDE_DIR "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${METIS_PATH}/include" CACHE INTERNAL "METIS: include directory" FORCE)
endif()
if (WITH_COMMDOM MATCHES "auto")
  add_subdirectory(commdom)
endif()
if (WITH_CANTERA MATCHES "external")
  add_subdirectory(cantera_fwrapper)
endif()
